page.title: 13 CUDHAM - THE VICAR'S DAY
page.content: The vicar of Cudham is responsible for both the Church of St. Peter & St. Paul and St. Mary's Church at Downe. Here is a typical working day. 8.30 Goes to Downe for weekly time of prayer. 9.15 Exhumation of ashes for reburial at request of dead man's widow. 10.00 Writes letter and diary page for parish magazine, makes telephone calls relating to weddings and funerals. 12.00 Attends Cudham Church School Governors Meeting. 16.30 Visits sick and bereaved person. Receives call about someone in trouble. Collects car from garage and visits 3 people in Downe, one recently made redundant. 20.00 to 22.00 Holds Church Fellowship Meeting at Vicarage. 23.30 Goes to bed.
